    • Method Detail

      • getCards

        public java.util.List<Card> getCards()
        Get Cards
        Specified by:
        getCards in interface MemoryMatchInterface
        Returns:
        A list of cards and their matches are returned in order for the player to have valid cards to select within the game.
        Ensure:
        A list of usable cards is created based on the corresponding difficulty.
        Require:
        The player starts a new game with a valid difficulty.

      • generateMemoryMatch

        public void generateMemoryMatch(java.lang.String difficulty)
        Generate Memory Match
        Specified by:
        generateMemoryMatch in interface MemoryMatchInterface
        Parameters:
        difficulty - The String value for the difficulty chosen for the memory match game.
        Ensure:
        A memory match game is generated with the chosen difficulty.
        Require:
        The user chooses the difficulty by clicking on the corresponding button from the difficulty frame window.

      • isMatch

        public boolean isMatch(Card cardOne,
                       Card cardTwo)
        Is Match
        Specified by:
        isMatch in interface MemoryMatchInterface
        Parameters:
        cardOne - The first card object that is selected and used to check for a match.
        cardTwo - The second card object that is selected and used to check for a match.
        Returns:
        The boolean value is returned which expresses if the two cards match.
        Ensure:
        A truth value is chosen based on whether or not the two cards have matching suit and value properties.
        Require:
        Two card objects are chosen with intention on checking to see if both cards have the same suit and value properties.
